about.me: Hi, I'm Mat. ECO Pool combines two of my loves â€“ nature and technology! Stake with ECO Pool and make the world a better place! We donate 30% of our pool fees to fight climate change and environmental challenges. Our mission is to support a variety of trusted charities, to sustain and regenerate nature and the diversity of life on earth. More details about our donations on ECOpool.io
about.server: Our bare metal servers are based on a reliable, low power infrastructure powered by 100% renewable energy! We are committed to a 100% uptime for our servers to provide the best returns for our delegators!
